high_descs: pick up the box from under the desk
take the box to the lamp on the right side of the desk
turn on the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: get an empty box from under the desk and look at it with the lamp on.

high_descs: Turn around and take a step to your right then walk to the desk.
Pick up the box that's on the floor under the desk.
Take a step to your right please.
Turn on the light that's on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a box by lamp light.

high_descs: turn left, walk a few steps, turn left, walk to the desk
pick up the box that is under the desk
take two steps to the right, hold box up to lamp
anns.task_desc: examine a box with a lamp
